curiosity.content: Snails have 4 noses: 2 for breathing and 2 for smelling.
Some lions can reproduce even 50 times a day
A dolphin's hearing is so fine that it can hear sounds 20 km away.
Elephants are the only mammals that can't jump.
Camels have 3 eyebrows to protect themselves from sand storms.
Giraffes do not have vocal cords and communicate by vibrating the air around their neck.
